statements: UPDATE user_interactions_audit SET action='login', details='Successful login' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE user_interactions_audit SET details='Error in processing request', action='error' WHERE user_id=102;
UPDATE user_interactions_audit SET action='logged in', details='Successful login' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-05-01 08:00:00';
UPDATE user_interactions_audit SET timestamp='2022-06-15 12:30:00', action='updated profile' WHERE user_id = 456 AND action = 'logged in';
UPDATE user_interactions SET action = 'like' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE security_monitoring SET event_type = 'login_success', event_timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND event_id = 789;
UPDATE user_interactions SET action = 'login' WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE security_monitoring SET event_type = 'login', event_timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_id = 5678 AND event_id = 9876;
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE ChangesAudit SET change_type = 'update' WHERE audit_id = 5;
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_data = '{"message":"New interaction data updated"}' WHERE interaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE ChangesAudit SET change_type = 'edited', change_data = '{"message":"Update performed successfully"}' WHERE audit_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_audit_log SET action='login' WHERE user_id=100;
UPDATE security_audit_log SET action='password_change', timestamp='2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id=200;
UPDATE user_audit_log SET action = 'User login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE change_audit_log SET table_name = 'products', action = 'Update', user_id = 456 WHERE id = 789;
UPDATE user_logs SET action = 'login' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE access_logs SET accessed_resource = 'profile' WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
UPDATE user_logs SET action = 'Login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE access_logs SET accessed_resource = '/home' WHERE user_id = 456;
